DOC.brief_summary: Cervical anastomotic leak one common complication trans-hiatal esophagectomy . Hypothesis : An early post operative administration pro-kinetic dosage erythromycin reduce leak occurrence . Design : This prospective , randomize , double blind , placebo control study . Number patient : 30 . Inclusion Criteria : - Patients trans-hiatal esophagectomy Exclusion Criteria : - Allergy erythromycin - Use phenothiazine - QT prolongation - Liver function test ( LFT ) abnormalities - Myasthenia gravis - Cardiomyopathy
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Erythromycin Occurrence Leaks From Cervical Esophageal-Gastric Anastomosis After Trans-Hiatal Esophagectomy
